basic_info.name: Paladugu Parvathi Devi College of Engineering and Technology Facilities

Section.name: About PPDV
Section.description:
Paladugu Parvathi Devi College of Engineering and Technology (PPDV ) was established in 2008 by Dr.Smt.Paladugu Parvathi Devi. The college is affiliated to Jawaharlal Nehru Technological University, Kakinada and approved by AICTE. The college offers Bachelor and Master courses in Engineering
PPDV AP EAPCET Cutoff 2024 is out. The table given below shows the cutoff for Round 1.
Campus Infrastructure
The campus is provided with following infrastructural facilities-
Library
The college has well-equipped library with more than 11,121 volumes & about 45 nationals and internationals journals.
Hostel
The college has facility for both boys and girls with capacity of accommodating more than 100 students.
